content: 5 single_crochet increase x 6= 42 22 6 single_crochet increase x 6= 48 place eyes between rounds 19 and 20 leaving 9 holes between them 1st eye is placed before the 2nd increase count 9 holes after the first eye and place the 2nd eye make sure you line the eyes up with the nostrils on round 5 if you want the sunken eye look do not place the backs of the eyes on until round 33 tip you may have to adjust the eye placement depending on yarn and hook size you use 23-26 single_crochet in each st around 27 6 single_crochet decrease x 6= 42 28-29 single_crochet in each st around 30 5 single_crochet decrease x 6= 36 now for the eyes stuff the head well cut a long piece of yarn and remove the eyes place the needle in the hole where the first eye was and thread the needle into a hole next to the eye hole go back and forth between each eye hole repeating the process from the first eye pull slightly on the yarn after going through each hole do this about 3 times on each side until you reach the look you want follow the pictures for help there is also a youtube video i have for extra help on this process https //www youtube com/watch v=9xobnty6k70&t=55s to place the backs of the eyes you will need to remove most of the stuffing to place the washers on the eyes then re stuff it sweet oddity art 3 head and body continued 31-34 single_crochet in each st around 35 11 single_crochet increase x 3= 39 36 single_crochet in each st around 37 12 single_crochet increase x 3= 42 38 single_crochet in each st around 39 13 single_crochet increase x 3= 45 40 single_crochet in each st around 41 14 single_crochet increase x 3= 48 42-47 single_crochet in each st around 48 decrease 14 single_crochet x 3= 45 49-50 single_crochet in each st around 51 decrease 13 single_crochet x 3= 42 52-53 single_crochet in each st around 54 decrease 12 single_crochet x 3= 39 55-56 single_crochet in each st around 57 decrease 11 single_crochet x 3= 36 58-59 single_crochet in each st around 60 decrease 10 single_crochet x 3= 33 61 decrease 9 single_crochet x 3= 30 62-67 single_crochet in each st around 68 3 single_crochet decrease x 6= 24 69-73 single_crochet in each st around 74 2 single_crochet decrease x 6= 18 75-79 single_crochet in each st around 80 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 81-85 single_crochet in each st around 86 2 single_crochet decrease x 3= 9 87 single_crochet in each st around 88 single_crochet decrease x 3= 6 f/o and sew the hole closed sweet oddity art 4 sweet oddity art 5 belly with color b chain 9 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across= 8 70-75 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across 2 chain 1 turn increase 6 single_crochet increase= 10 76 chain 1 turn decrease
